divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cigeratte and out of the corner of my eye I saw a red lights flashing. At first it was flashing in a circular motion and then solid red and a blinking light on the bottom. It was moving NW at a slow rate of speed and just took off like nothing I have seen. At first I thought that it may have been a plane, since I live close to a small airport, and I see planes all day coming and going. Plus I see planes coming and going from the Pittsburgh Airport. I was so fixated on the object that I was entreged by it that I didn't get my video camera. Which upseted me.
Summary: extremely bright red lights, flashing then solid color with one blinking red light on bottom
